text: Nocardiopsis oceani is a Gram-positive and aerobic bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from the South China Sea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis oceani at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2015
title: Nocardiopsis oceani
